summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Jefferson Heights Addition, Division No. 1, from Beacon Avenue to Angeline Street, and certain parts of certain streets and avenues, by constructing sewers all in accordance with Resolution No. 10816 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
